message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate further!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with too much!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give you all the power!
You're getting closer, Alice, but I'm not there yet. I want more!
I'm not giving you all the power, Bob! Meet me in the middle, or we'll keep negotiating!
I'm not backing down, Alice. I want more, and I'm willing to take it!
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob. Meet me at 33/67, or we'll see what happens!
